<small>Hebrew form: [[H5102]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְהִיר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְהוֺר‎</span>] **noun masculine** ==light== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְהוֺרָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; see Biblical Hebrew II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נהר‎</span>); — emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נהירא‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], &lt; <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְהוֺרָא‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (compare [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Syriac; [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>LCB 1896, 703</sup>) [[Dan.2.22|Dan 2:22]]. 

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נַהִירוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§§ 16. 5; 61, 4</sup>) **noun feminine** ==illumination, insight== (Syriac ***id.***); — absolute [[Dan.5.11|Dan 5:11]]; [[Dan.5.14|Dan 5:14]] (both + <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׂכְלְתָנוּ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חָכְמָה‎</span>).
